availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Rebecca Crawford. Father of Simeon Crawford, Stephen G. Crawford, Elizabeth G. Crawford, and Catharine Crawford.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 62. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 101. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Haynes, p. 17. “Hugh C Crawford (1809-1874),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 38394699, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=CRA&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=7601&GRid=38394699& (accessed June 27, 2017).
